Daily Tasks

  • [ ] Create Routes in funnel builder app
  • [ ] create firestore doc and structures
  • [ ] create dummy data for rendering in doc file
  • [ ] create github push perhaps to netify so xyz docs can render
  • [ ] create component in md to display data from db
  • [ ] Drag and drop builder for md
  • [ ] Create the Markdown syntax

Status overview

PlannedStartedIncompleteComplete
Electron Desktop App
Webhooks
Publish to git
Drag and drop
Style Changer

Description

The document builder allows users within a collaboration team on the funnel builder platform to create markdown files and deploy document like files.

Frontend : Funnel builder platform. Backend : Firebase Database.

App Routes

router view defined in src/app.vue

<!-- src/app.vue -->
<router-view name="documentbuilder-view" v-if="currentUser"></router-view>

src/router/index.js

  • DocumentBuilder - Main Dashboard view
  • DocumentBuilderCreate - rout wrapper
  • userdocuments - list of users documents component
  • namedocument - first step in creating a new document
  • documentControl - document editor building page
/*src/router/index.js*/
//import into available routes
import DocumentBuilder from '@/views/documentBuilder/index';
import DocumentBuilderCreate from '@/components/Layouts/BuilderLayouts/DocumentBuilder/DocumentBuilderCreate';
import userdocuments from '@/components/DocumentBuilder/UserDocuments';
import namedocument from '@/components/DocumentBuilder/NameDocument';
import documentControl from '@/components/DocumentBuilder/documentControl';


const router = new Router({
    mode: 'history',
    routes: [{ 
        /*...*/
                //start new     
        {
            path: '/DocumentBuilder',
            name: 'DocumentBuilder',
            components: {
                default: DocumentBuilder,
                'dashboard-view': XyzDash
            },
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: true
            }
        },
        //user documents
        {
            path: '/userdocuments',
            name: 'userdocuments',
            components: {
                default: userdocuments,
                'dashboard-view': XyzDash
            },
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: true
            }
        },
             
        ///User documents
        //document builder
        //document name page
        {
            path: '/NewDocument',
            name: 'namedocument',
            components: {
                default: namedocument,
                'documentbuilder-view': DocumentBuilderCreate
            },
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: true
            }
        },
        ///top level page view
        //Document building page
        {
            path: '/NewDocument/:currentDocument/:currentVersion',
            name: 'documentControl',
            components: {
                default: documentControl,
                'documentbuilder-view': DocumentBuilderCreate
            },
            meta: {
                requiresAuth: true
            }
        },  
        ///document builder
    ]
})
